text: function parseT'() = if input = 'a' or input = 'b' or input = '$' then parseT() ; match('$') else reportError() function parseT() = if input = 'b' or input = 'c' or input = '$' then parseR() else if input = 'a' then match('a') ; parseT() ; mateh('c') else reportError() function parseR() = if input = 'c' or input = '$' then (+ do nothing, just return +) else if input = 'b' then match('b') ; parseR() else reportError() Fig. 2.17 Recursive descent parser for Grammar 2.9
